title: TPC’s Unpack This Video Feat. Radavist x Sklar Bikes Super Something
content:
John swung by TPC HQ to talk with Bruce Lin about our recently launched Radavist Edition Super Something builds in collaboration with Sklar Bikes. Check out the Unpack This video here!

The special-edition The Radavist x Sklar Super Something has arrived! To celebrate nearly a decade of friendship, The Radavist and Sklar Bikes teamed up to make a limited run of custom-painted Super Something frames with five curated builds. John Watson of The Radavist explains what makes these steel gravel bikes so unique, and why you might want one to take on your next adventure.

These are available today, shipping from our parent company, TPC, in our Radavist shop. 

The post TPC’s Unpack This Video Feat. Radavist x Sklar Bikes Super Something appeared first on The Radavist.
author: Josh Weinberg
